pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bernstein Polynomial Based Semiparametric Survival Analysis // A set of reliable routines to ease semiparametric survival regression modeling based on Bernstein polynomials. 'spsurv' includes proportional hazards, proportional odds and accelerated failure time frameworks for right-censored data. RV Panaro (2020) arXiv:2003.10548.
